[VOLUNTEER] - ASEAN Young Professionals Volunteer Corps (AYPVC) 2014 in Myanmar # <3

Don't miss a chance to explore Myanmar and apply today !!!!!

AYPVC is a regional volunteering programme initiated by the Brunei government in conjunction with the ASEAN Chairmanship in 2013. It was endorsed at the VIII ASEAN Ministerial Meeting on Youth (AMMY) in Bandar Seri Begawan in May the same year.

We are looking for a total of 24 volunteers (aged 18 to 30) from all over ASEAN:
18 ASEAN-nonMyanmar + 4 Myanmar professionals + 2 media team member i.e. Photographer & videographer with either: 
> Education and advocacy background
> Youth development background 
> Academic background
> Healthcare sector background - doctor, nurse, dentist, nutritionist 
> NGO expertise 
> General skills that will be valuable for project implementation and delivery (e.g. teaching, marketing, training)

Volunteers must demonstrate that they have:

Understanding of the alleviation of poverty
Community engagement experience through past or ongoing projects 
Experience with conducting health check-ups 
Ability to communicate effectively
Strong ability to speak English 
Presentation skills 
People skills, leadership ability etc. 
Interest for team work

Note: We encourage both matured university students and young professionals with various skills and experiences to apply. Based on the success of past AYPVC programmes that focused on volunteer led activities, AYPVC Myanmar will follow this format to enable volunteers to show their creativity and critical thinking in producing solutions by working together.

APPLY HERE: 
Application closes on 8th December 2014.

Date of project: 6th to 20th January 2015.

For more information: http://goo.gl/dJTEPx
Application form: http://goo.gl/0mDV8n

[VOLUNTEER] from Asean Youth Volunteers Network

Greetings from CAYC,
The Government of Brunei Darussalam will be organising the next series of volunteer projects in the ASEAN region under the ASEAN Young Professionals Volunteer Programme (AYPVC). AYPVC was endorsed during the Eighth ASEAN Ministerial Meeting on Youth held in Brunei Darussalam in 2013. This year, AYPVC will be organised in Vietnam, Laos and Myanmar.
currently opening up applications for AYPVC Vietnam which will be held from 23 November to 7 December 2014 in Thua Thien Hue Province, Vietnam.
Volunteers will be focusing on environmental sustainability, working with the community and young environmental activists to promote environmental awareness and sustainable practices. Volunteers will also support a local daycare by constructing a fence to prevent children from road accidents.
Qualifications:
Citizens of ASEAN member countries
Aged between 18 to 30 years old
Has a valid passport (date of expiry not less than 6 months after travel date)
In excellent health condition
Environmental background either through past volunteering or professional capacity
Requirements:
Completed online application form
CV and video profile (not more than 5 minutes) emailed to aseanypvc@gmail.com
Expenses covered by organiser:
Return flight tickets from home country to the volunteer location
Meals during the programme
Accommodation
Local transport
Insurance 
To download the concept paper: http://goo.gl/bgA25s
Link to application form: http://bit.ly/1ud6MSM
Facebook: www.facebook.com/aypvc
Application closes on 15th October 2014.
For more information, please contact aseanypvc@gmail.com
Good luck.. 
cheers!
bee zurkiple
CAYC Executive Secretary
